test.name: @Verificar se ao preencher os campos do formulario corretamente os dados são inseridos na lista e se um novo card é criado no time esperado

kw.name: Dado que o usuario acesse Organo
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Dado que preencha os campos do formulario
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'João Felipe' into text field 'id:form-nome'.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Engenheiro de produção agroindustrial' into text field 'id:form-cargo'.

kw.name: Image Url
kw.doc: Returns URL to placeholder image Example: http://placehold.it/640x480

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: E clique no botão criar card
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Então exibe card no time esperado
Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
